PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2007-18852007-12-06,  ,  ,  ,  TC
ActPort Authorities Management Regulations
PrecisIssuance of a CERTIFICATE OF AMALGAMATION which would require a number of port authorities in British Columbia (Vancouver, Fraser River and North Fraser) to amalgamate and continue as one port authority to be named the VANCOUVER FRASER PORT AUTHORITY, effective January 1, 2008.
RegistrationRegistration: SI/ 2007-0118 Publication Date: 2007-12-26
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Issuance of a CERTIFICATE OF AMALGAMATION which would require a number of port authorities in British Columbia (Vancouver, Fraser River and North Fraser) to amalgamate and continue as one port authority to be named the VANCOUVER FRASER PORT AUTHORITY, effective January 1, 2008.
